basic.description: This course explores plate tectonics and earth structure. Current methods of probing the interior: seismology and seismic tomography, geomagnetics, geoid and gravity, geochemistry and geochronology, heat flow, mantle convection, core convection and the geodynamo.
basic.subject: GLY
basic.title: Introduction to Geophysics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAP 2302 and PHY 2049; or instructor permission.
